alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Hennepin; Ramsey (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 9:55PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Hennepin, northwestern Dakota and southern Ramsey Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 954 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wayzata to Richfield to Inver Grove Heights. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Minneapolis/St. Paul International Airport gusted to 45 mph at 942 PM. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Eagan, Inver Grove Heights, South St. Paul, West St. Paul and Mendota Heights around 1000 PM CDT. Bloomington around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Burnsville, Apple Valley and Rosemount. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
